title: Mastering Reaction Conditions: Scientific Inquiry into Chemical Reaction Conditions through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Balancing chemical equations, understanding molar concepts, basic reaction kinetics, and experimental variable control methods
context.additional_context: An environment where in-service secondary school teachers reinterpret chemical reaction conditions in practical contexts and maintain learning motivation through peer evaluation and gamification elements. It is systematically designed to allow learners to experience the scientific inquiry process (hypothesis setting–experiment–observation–analysis–conclusion).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify the limiting reagent based on experimental data under various chemical reaction conditions.
Learners can predict changes in product yield according to reactant ratio variations through quantitative analysis and graph interpretation.
Learners will enhance collaborative problem-solving and scientific inquiry skills with peers through gamification activities (leaderboards, missions).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
